name: isolines
desc: Produce lines of constant value which can be offset from a 2D surface, or the external faces of a 3D surface.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Suppress Warnings
properties.desc: The Suppress Warnings toggle will turn of the warnings alerting the user that they have invalid input for creating isolines.  This is useful in animations where data may not vary at multiple points.

properties.name: Color Lines
properties.desc: Lines and labels can be colored by either data or a selected solid Default Color.

properties.name: Default Color
properties.desc: The Color For both the lines and labels if not colored by data.

properties.name: Isoline Component
properties.desc: The Isoline Component refers to the nodal data component that will be used to create isolines.

properties.name: Isolines Method
properties.desc: The Isolines Method allows the user to choose between automatically generating isolevels or setting them by hand.

properties.name: Logarithmic Decades
properties.desc: When the data has been log processed the Logarithmic Decades determines the number of isolines.  If the Log option is selected the Isolines Per Log Decade value is used. If Unformatted is selected the Number Of Isolines is used.

properties.name: Isolines Per Log Decade
properties.desc: If the Log Option is Selected for Logarithmic Decades the increments per decade can be set with this value.

properties.name: Number Of Isolines
properties.desc: When the data is log processed the Number If Isolines refers to the number of isolines per decade.  If the data is linear processed the number of isolines refers to the total number of isolines to be drawn.

properties.name: Min Max Linking
properties.desc: The Min Max Linking control control is used to set the linked values for the Minimum and Maximum Isoline levels.  If the min and max values for the selected component have been changed, Recalculate can be used to find the actual min and max.

properties.name: Minimum Isoline Level
properties.desc: The Minimum isoline level input field allows the user to constrain the isoline data range. The default value entered into the edit fields is the minimum value of the data component selected.

properties.name: Maximum Isoline Level
properties.desc: The Maximum isoline level input field allows the user to constrain the isoline data range. The default value entered into the edit fields is the maximum value of the data component selected.

properties.name: Additional Lines At Min Max
properties.desc: If the Additional Lines At Min Max toggle is selected two additional lines are created at the Minimum and Maximum Isoline Level if possible.

properties.name: Isoline Levels
properties.desc: The Set Isoline Levels are user defined isolevels.

properties.name: Cell Subdivision
properties.desc: The Cell Subdivision level controls the number of element subdivisions to be performed before drawing the isolines. The higher the number, the more accurately the isolines will be placed through the data. Higher accuracy may not always cause the isolines to become smoother, this depends on the data distribution.

properties.name: Surface Offset
properties.desc: The Surface Offset controls where the isolines will be placed, vertically, in reference to the surface.

properties.name: Offset In True Scale
properties.desc: The Offset In True Scale toggle will cause the Surface Offset to happen in model coordinates.

properties.name: Add Labels
properties.desc: The Add Labels toggle specifies whether labels are added.

properties.name: Flip Labels Horizontally
properties.desc: The Flip Labels Horizontally toggle will flip all labels upside down. Depending on the viewpoint and the data, this may be useful for making the labels more readable.

properties.name: Flip Labels Vertically
properties.desc: The Flip Labels Vertically toggle will flip all labels to the other side of the surface. Depending on the viewpoint and the data, this may be useful for making the labels more readable.

properties.name: Label Spacing
properties.desc: The Label Spacing value .

properties.name: Label Height
properties.desc: The Label Height scales the size of each label.

properties.name: Label Start
properties.desc: The Label Start will offset the start of each label along the line.

properties.name: Format Label Numbers
properties.desc: The Format Label Numbers control allows the user to set how numbers that are turned into labels will be formatted.

properties.name: Label Suffix
properties.desc: The Label Suffix is a string that is appended to each label.

properties.name: User Suffix
properties.desc: If the User Specified option is selected in Label Suffix, the string can be set with this value.
